text: Hopea nutans is a large rainforest tree species in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is found in Peninsular Malaysia and Borneo. The tallest measured specimen is 82.8 m tall in the Tawau Hills National Park, in Sabah on the island of Borneo. ==References== nutans Category:Trees of Borneo Category:Trees of Peninsular Malaysia Category:Critically endangered flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hopea nutans
